name: GadgetNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite gadget source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

What is new? What is cool? Find out!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
